# [Epic] Creative Factory - Brief Builder & Variant Generator

## Overview
Tools for creating, managing, and optimizing creative assets.

## Stories
- [ ] ORB-059: Build Brief Builder
- [ ] ORB-060: Implement Variant Generator
- [ ] ORB-061: Create Fatigue Detector

## Acceptance Criteria
- Campaign brief wizard with objectives and targeting
- AI generates ad copy and image variations
- Detect creative fatigue from performance decay
- Suggest refresh timing based on historical patterns

## Dependencies
- Epic 3.5 (Content Library)

## Technical Notes
- Brief template system with customizable fields
- AI variant generation via image/text models
- Fatigue detection algorithm (CTR decay analysis)
- Integration with Content Library for asset management
